title: Technical Specialist-Enterprise Apps
description:
Area(s) of responsibility
   

  

 We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Hybris 4C professional to join our dynamic team. The successful candidate will be responsible for implementing and maintaining our Hybris 4C platform, ensuring its optimal performance. This role involves working closely with our IT and marketing teams to develop and execute digital strategies, manage product catalogues, and enhance customer experience. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of Hybris 4C, with the ability to troubleshoot and resolve any issues that may arise, while also contributing to the development of new features and functionalities.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Develop and implement new software programs using Hybris 4C.
* Maintain and improve the performance of existing software.
* Clearly and regularly communicate with management and technical support colleagues.
* Design and update software database, including MySQL and REST API's.


**Required Skills**
* Proficiency in MySQL: The candidate must have a strong understanding of MySQL database management and be able to handle complex queries.
* Expertise in REST API's: The candidate should have a deep understanding of REST API's, including how to integrate them into existing software and how to troubleshoot issues.
* Experience with PostMan: The candidate should be familiar with using PostMan for API testing and debugging.
* A Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field is required.


**Preferred Skills**
* Jenkins: Experience with Jenkins for continuous integration is a plus.
* Java: Knowledge of Java programming language is beneficial.
* Jira: Familiarity with Jira for project management and bug tracking is advantageous.
* Communication Skills: Strong verbal and written communication skills are desirable.
* SOAP API: Understanding of SOAP API's is a plus.
* Problem\\-solving skills: Ability to troubleshoot and resolve issues effectively.
* Teamwork: Ability to work well in a team.
* Time management: Ability to manage time effectively and meet deadlines.
* Knowledge of Agile methodologies: Familiarity with Agile development methodologies is beneficial.
* Customer service skills: Ability to interact effectively with clients.

title: Founding Engineer
description:
Founding Engineering Intern (Full\\-Stack) — MVP, Beta, AI\\-Ready
 



  





 Company: GoodBreach (UK Fintech Startup)
 



 Location: Remote (India)
 



 Type: Full\\-time Internship (3 months)
 



 Start: Immediate
 



  





 ⸻
 



  





 About GoodBreach
 



  





 GoodBreach is a behaviour\\-first, AI\\-powered micro\\-savings platform helping Gen Z \\& Millennials save without budgeting fatigue. We have a working MVP and are currently in beta testing with real users.
 



  





 Our roadmap is intentional:
 



 MVP → Beta → Metrics \\& Security → Behavioural Data → AI Models.
 



  





 ⸻
 



  





 Role Overview
 



  





 We’re looking for a Founding Engineering Intern (Full\\-Stack) who is comfortable working across backend, frontend, integrations, and testing, and who wants to help shape the product during beta and beyond.
 



  





 You’ll work directly with the Founder and Platform Lead to:
 



 • Stabilise and improve the MVP
 



 • Revamp features based on beta feedback
 



 • Build dashboards and security foundations
 



 • Prepare and later contribute to AI model development
 



  





 This is a high\\-ownership, hands\\-on role—your code will ship to production.
 



  





 ⸻
 



  





 What You’ll Work On
 



  





 1\\) Full\\-Stack Product Development
 



 • Build and maintain backend services using NestJS (preferred)
 



 • Develop frontend features using Next.js (preferred)
 



 • Contribute to mobile features using Flutter (nice to have)
 



 • Improve APIs, data models, and application performance
 



  





 ⸻
 



  





 2\\) Third\\-Party API Integrations
 



 • Integrate and manage external APIs:
 



 • Payments / wallets
 



 • Analytics
 



 • Open Banking abstractions
 



 • Handle authentication, webhooks, retries, and error handling
 



 • Ensure integrations are secure, reliable, and well\\-documented
 



  





 ⸻
 



  





 3\\) MVP \\& Beta Testing Support
 



 • Support MVP and beta testing cycles:
 



 • bug fixing
 



 • regression testing
 



 • feature tweaks based on feedback
 



 • Collaborate with product to iterate quickly (build → test → learn)
 



 • Improve logging, monitoring, and observability
 



  





 ⸻
 



  





 4\\) Metrics, Dashboards \\& Security
 



 • Implement event tracking and define clear beta metrics:
 



 • onboarding \\& activation
 



 • savings actions \\& streaks
 



 • nudge engagement
 



 • retention
 



 • Build internal dashboards for product decisions
 



 • Implement foundational security parameters:
 



 • authentication \\& access control
 



 • encryption (at rest \\& in transit)
 



 • secure API practices
 



 • consent\\-driven data handling
 



  





 ⸻
 



  





 5\\) AI Capabilities \\& Models
 



 • Implement rule\\-based insights and nudges during beta
 



 • Prepare clean, structured datasets for modelling
 



 • Contribute to AI model development post\\-beta, such as:
 



 • spend pattern detection
 



 • savings propensity scoring
 



 • personalised nudge timing
 



 • Work on translating AI outputs into user\\-friendly actions
 



  





 ⸻
 



  





 Tech Stack (Current / Preferred)
 



 • Backend: NestJS (Node.js)
 



 • Frontend: Next.js
 



 • Mobile: Flutter (nice to have)
 



 • Database: PostgreSQL / Firebase
 



 • Cloud: AWS / GCP
 



 • AI: Rules → ML models (post\\-beta)
 



 • Tools: Git, CI/CD, API testing tools
 



  





 ⸻
 



  





 Who Should Apply
 



 • Final\\-year students or recent graduates (CS / IT / Engineering)
 



 • Interested in fintech, AI\\-powered products, and startups
 



 • Can commit 35 hours/week
 



  





 ⸻
 



  





 Bonus (Nice to Have)
 



 • Flutter or mobile app experience
 



 • Experience with analytics or dashboards
 



 • Exposure to fintech or regulated systems
 



 • ML / AI projects or coursework
 



  





 ⸻
 



  





 What You’ll Get
 



 • Work on a fintech product with real users
 



 • End\\-to\\-end exposure: product, engineering, security, AI
 



 • Direct mentorship from founder
 



 • Strong chance of long\\-term / full\\-time role
 



 • Internship certificate \\+ reference
 



  





 ⸻
 



  





 How to Apply
 



  





 Send:
 



 • Resume with GitHub / portfolio
 



 • 2–3 lines on why full\\-stack \\+ AI products excite you
 



  





 ⸻
 



  





 Founder Note
 



  





 “We don’t build AI for demos—we build it after understanding real behaviour. If you care about clean systems, clear metrics, and meaningful AI, you’ll fit right in.”
 



  





 Immediate Work Will Involve
 



 Support with bet testing and collecting metrics
 



 Understand the stack and code built
 



 FCA approval

title: Systems Software Security - Senior QA Engineer
description:
This role has been designed as ‘Hybrid’ with an expectation that you will work on average 2 days per week from an HPE office.
   

  

**Who We Are**
 Hewlett Packard Enterprise is the global edge\\-to\\-cloud company advancing the way people live and work. We help companies connect, protect, analyze, and act on their data and applications wherever they live, from edge to cloud, so they can turn insights into outcomes at the speed required to thrive in today’s complex world. Our culture thrives on finding new and better ways to accelerate what’s next. We know varied backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good. If you are looking to stretch and grow your career our culture will embrace you. Open up opportunities with HPE.
   

  

**Job Description**
**High Performance Computing, AI and Labs** 
 is a critical element of HPE. We are focused on delivering innovative solutions that accelerate our customers’ digital transformation, enabling them to tackle their complex, and data\\-intensive workloads. Combining deep expertise and the development of the world’s most cutting\\-edge, high\\-performance supercomputers, is defining the next era of computing delivering valuable insight \\& innovation. Join us and redefine what’s next for you.
   

  

**HPE Nonstop** 
 is a complete software stack and offers a rich suite of security products to protect Nonstop workloads and data \\- be it the new crypto, standards compliance, auditing, new security design in the enterprise and so on. Nonstop comes with its own unique security architecture that has continued to protect the Nonstop deployments over time. The portfolio of security products is enhanced at regular intervals to stay with times and ahead of the curve.
   

  

 At Nonstop, we have been studying the trends, listening to our customers, and looking at ways to not only make Nonstop secure but also enable customers to secure their Nonstop environment and implement corporate security practices for their Nonstop infrastructure. Given that Nonstop is a complete software stack, we look at it in terms of –
 **a)** 
 security infrastructure available in the platform for customers and application developers protect and secure the information flow
 **b)** 
 Integrate into Enterprise’s Authentication and Access control architecture
 **c)** 
 implement modern cryptography
 **d)** 
 help customers monitor their Nonstop workloads using modern tools and techniques
 **e)** 
 implement advanced forensics to track user actions
 **f)** 
 help customers implement regular compliance measures and demonstrate compliance
 **g)** 
 monitor emerging threats from a technology landscape, research and scout for solutions.
   

  

**What You'll Do**
* Leads multiple project teams of other software quality assurance engineers and internal and outsourced development partners responsible for all stages of quality assurance for complex products and platforms, including testing strategy, analysis, coding, results evaluation, and proposed corrective actions.
* Manages and expands relationships with internal and outsourced development and quality assurance partners on software design and development.
* Reviews and evaluates designs and project activities for compliance with quality assurance guidelines and standards; provides tangible feedback to improve product quality and mitigate failure risk.
* Provides domain\\-specific expertise and overall software quality assurance leadership and perspective to cross\\-organization projects, programs, and activities.
* Drives innovation and integration of new technologies into projects and activities in the software quality assurance organization.
* Provides guidance and mentoring to less\\- experienced staff members.


**What You Need To Bring**
***Education and Experience Required:***
* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or equivalent.
* Typically 10\\+ years experience
* Experience in the qualification of secure software systems, security products and features (eg. SSL, SSH, IPSEC) on Linux or similar UNIX systems
* Proven expertise in developing comprehensive test strategies based on architecture and software design for products and customer usage of the solutions.
* Expertise in design and development of automation frameworks.
* Strong knowledge of security basic concepts (authentication, access control, auditing, ciphers, cryptography, key management, etc) and security technologies
* Extensive experience with multiple software quality assurance tools and processes
* Experience in development of comprehensive test strategies


**Knowledge And Skills**
* Evaluating forms and processes for software testing and methodology, including writing and execution of test plans, debugging, and testing scripts and tools.
* Good understanding of secure testing concepts, familiarity with system\\-level programming, OS internals
* Advanced programming and scripting skills on Linux platforms
* Excellent analytical and problem solving skills. Attention to detail and accuracy
* Ability to collaborate effectively across a geographically distributed cross\\-functional team
* Excellent communication skills, ability to effectively communicate, influence and negotiate options at senior management levels.
* Proven experience in coaching and mentoring of team members
* Experience with AI is a plus.


**Additional Skills**
 Cloud Architectures, Cross Domain Knowledge, Design Thinking, Development Fundamentals, DevOps, Distributed Computing, Microservices Fluency, Full Stack Development, Security\\-First Mindset, Solutions Design, Testing \\& Automation, User Experience (UX)
   

  

**What We Can Offer You**
**Health \\& Wellbeing**
 We strive to provide our team members and their loved ones with a comprehensive suite of benefits that supports their physical, financial and emotional wellbeing.
   

  

**Personal \\& Professional Development**
 We also invest in your career because the better you are, the better we all are. We have specific programs catered to helping you reach any career goals you have — whether you want to become a knowledge expert in your field or apply your skills to another division.
   

  

**Unconditional Inclusion**
 We are unconditionally inclusive in the way we work and celebrate individual uniqueness. We know varied backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good.
   

  

**Let's Stay Connected**
 Follow @HPECareers on Instagram to see the latest on people, culture and tech at HPE.
   

  

 \\#india
   

  

 \\#highperformancecompute
   

  

**Job**
 Engineering
   

  

**Job Level**
 TCP\\_04
   

  

 HPE is an Equal Employment Opportunity/ Veterans/Disabled/LGBT employer. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, gender, or any other protected category, and all decisions we make are made on the basis of qualifications, merit, and business need. Our goal is to be one global team that is representative of our customers, in an inclusive environment where we can continue to innovate and grow together. Please click here: Equal Employment Opportunity.
   

  

**Hewlett Packard Enterprise is EEO Protected Veteran/ Individual with Disabilities.**
 HPE will comply with all applicable laws related to employer use of arrest and conviction records, including laws requiring employers to consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories.
   

  

**No Fees Notice \\& Recruitment Fraud Disclaimer**
*It has come to HPE’s attention that there has been an increase in recruitment fraud whereby scammer impersonate HPE or HPE\\-authorized recruiting agencies and offer fake employment opportunities to candidates. These scammers often seek to obtain personal information or money from candidates.*
*Please note that Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE), its direct and indirect subsidiaries and affiliated companies, and its authorized recruitment agencies/vendors
 **will never charge any candidate a registration fee, hiring fee, or any other fee in connection with its recruitment and hiring process.** 
 The credentials of any hiring agency that claims to be working with HPE for recruitment of talent should be verified by candidates and candidates shall be solely responsible to conduct such verification. Any candidate/individual who relies on the erroneous representations made by fraudulent employment agencies does so at their own risk, and HPE disclaims liability for any damages or claims that may result from any such communication.*

title: Engineer/ Sr. Proposal Engineer
description:
**Job Description**
 Location: Udaipur, Rajasthan
   

  

 Experience: Minimum 1–2 years of experience OR Fresher
   

  

 Department: Sales \\& Marketing (Back End)
   

  

 Role Type: Full\\-Time
   

  

**About The Role**
 The Engineer / Senior Proposal Engineer (Back End – Marketing Department)
   

  

 Is responsible for supporting the marketing and sales functions by preparing accurate, competitive,
   

  

 and technically compliant proposals for projects. This role focuses on backend engineering, Routine,
   

  

 Tender Offer preparation.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
  Analyze tender documents, RFQs, and client inquiries to understand technical and
   

  

 commercial requirements.
   

  

  Prepare technical proposals, cost estimates, BOQs, and commercial offers in
   

  

 coordination with engineering, procurement, and sales teams.
   

  

  Develop project scopes, specifications, timelines, and compliance statements in line
   

  

 with client and industry standards.
   

  

  Coordinate with internal departments to obtain inputs on design, materials, pricing,
   

  

 and execution strategy.
   

  

  Ensure all proposals are accurate, competitive, complete, and submitted within
   

  

 deadlines.
   

  

  Maintain proposal documentation, version control, and approval workflows.
   

  

  Support pre\\-bid meetings, technical clarifications, and client negotiations when
   

  

 required.
   

  

  Identify risks, assumptions, and value\\-engineering opportunities to enhance
   

  

 proposal competitiveness.
   

  

  Update proposal databases, cost benchmarks, and standard templates for
   

  

 continuous improvement.
   

  

**What You Should Bring**
* Minimum 1–2 years of experience in sales or marketing for Sr. Proposal Engineer \\& Fresher for


 Engineer.
   

  

* Technical background of B. Tech

title: Senior Engineer- APA Predictive Analysis
description:
****Job Requirements****
 At Quest Global, it’s not just what we do but how and why we do it that makes us different. With over 25 years as an engineering services provider, we believe in the power of doing things differently to make the impossible possible. Our people are driven by the desire to make the world a better place—to make a positive difference that contributes to a brighter future. We bring together technologies and industries, alongside the contributions of diverse individuals who are empowered by an intentional workplace culture, to solve problems better and faster.
